## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G42880](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G42880)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PRK3</u>
- **Gene Name:** pollen receptor like kinase 3
- **Description:**   Leucine-rich repeat protein kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2078546
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [prk 3 prk6]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Defective in pollen tube guidance and growth leading to reduced fertility. Decreased responsiveness to pollen tube attractant LURE1.2.
   - [prk1 prk3 prk6]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Severe defects in pollen tube guidance and growth and reduced fertility. Decreased responsiveness to pollen tube attractant LURE1.2.
